questionTitle: Take the juice ________ the fridge.
You can eat ________ you like!
After the battle, the ________ soldiers were helped by those who could walk.
I apologise ________ not writing sooner.
I do ________ I could speak French well.
Don't you think you ought ________ much harder?
His parents made him ________ very hard .
They ________ Spanish for about two years so far.
We ________ it with Tom and Jane a month ago.
We eat ________ soup with ________ spoon.
Since they aren't answering their telephone, they ________.
If you want to find good information about graduate programs in the United States, look in ________ of the College Blue Books.
Almost every citizen of a large city suffers ________ of organized crime.
anwers: as a result of the debility

questionTitle: Her feeling of ebullience was so contagious that all the other patients ________.
Our Constitution was based on the belief that the free interchange of ideas ________ the preservation of a democratic society.
If you take a train or a bus, you must pay a ________.
________ we had driving in the country!
He went to a seaside resort because he was ________ on water-skiing.
How ________ meat did you buy?
There is no necessary connection between a dollar and what can be purchased for a dollar; the value of money is ________ and can be ________ by supply and demand .
